Introduction
This topic includes guidance on qualifying periods of service for presumptive SC for COVID-19, including
qualifying period of service requirements
required duration of service
, and
inactive duty for training (IADT) as qualifying service
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
